hcc_text: Fulton Avenue is in the middle third in the Bronx for pedestrian deaths and serious injuries per mile.
info: At Fulton Avenue at Cross Bx Exwy Nb En Fulton Avenue, Crotona Park North and Cross Bx Service Road South, there was 1 severe injury in crashes between 2008 and 2012.
intersection: Fulton Avenue at Cross Bx Exwy Nb En Fulton Avenue, Crotona Park North and Cross Bx Service Road South
